means: 歪扭或波形短线，难认的笔迹

sentence.Network_en: Is this squiggle supposed to be a signature?
sentence.Network_cn: 这歪歪扭扭的玩意儿就算是签名 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: With a squiggle of Laura Bo's pen - her signature was usually unreadable - she could make the check official.
sentence.Network_cn: 劳拉·波只要大笔一挥 —— 她的签字往往是难以辨认的 —— 就可以使这张支票生效.

sentence.Network_en: A squiggle implies that you are too busy and disinterested in the letter.
sentence.Network_cn: 胡乱的签名将意味着你过于繁忙并对此信漠不关心.

PerfectNetExp.abs: jittery的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... efficacious 有效的, 灵验的... squiggle 波形曲线, 花体... diversion 转移.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S5) ... squiffy 微醉的 squiggle 胡乱写的字 squiggly 弯弯曲曲的.
刘志岩说，“当一个连名字写得歪歪扭扭（squiggle）的农民兄弟，都开始关心自己到底是不是‘露西’的后代时，考古大众化之路已初见 …
jittery的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... efficacious 有效的, 灵验的... squiggle 波形曲线, 花体... diversion 转移.

list.abs: A snake squiggled up the tree ., 一条蛇蠕动着爬上了树.
resting the mouse pointer over the squiggle will turn the symbol into a smart- tag panel .在将鼠标指针停留在波形曲线上时，该符号将会变成一个智能标记面板。
Higher - elevation white squiggles are probably the canopy of trees growing along small water channels ., 高海拔的白色短线可能是沿着小水道的树木形成的树冠层.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: perhaps a blend of squirm and wiggle or wriggle

entry.tran: 不规则的曲线;波形曲线
entry.def: A squiggle is a line that bends and curls in an irregular way.

sentences.sentence: "his signature was just a squiggle but only he could make that squiggle"

auth_sentence.content: JUST what London needs, a giant squiggle.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: JUST what London needs, a giant squiggle.

auth_sentence.content: It's also a step on, witnessed by the heavier guitar fest and gorgeous keyboard squiggle in the opening Can't Fish.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's also a step on, witnessed by the heavier guitar fest and gorgeous keyboard squiggle in the opening Can't Fish.

auth_sentence.content: I feel I must write a squiggle which I couldn't say on the telephone without bursting into those silly tears.
auth_sentence.res_content: I feel I must write a squiggle which I couldn't say on the telephone without bursting into those silly tears.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I feel I must write a squiggle which I couldn't say on the telephone without bursting into those silly tears.

sentences.en: His handwriting squiggled across the page.
sentences.cn: 他写的字弯弯曲曲地布满该页。
